channel.title: Tag: gnomes - blog.lmorchard.com
channel.description: It's all spinning wheels & self-doubt until the first pot of coffee.

item.title: Don’t Thank the Gnomes
item.description: I started the morning by sneaking into a strange house through an unsealed milk door. There was a broken shoe heel on the second floorâ€”its wrongness drew me up the stairs as sure as a cord tied round my ribs. It was done before the lady of the house could sigh.
